title: O Christ, With Each Returning Morn
author: John Keble

verses.text:
O Christ, with each returning morn,
Thine image to our hearts is borne;
O may we ever clearly see
Our God and Savior, Lord, in Thee!

O Christ, our true and only Light,
Illume our souls with heavenly sight;
And may our lives, like mirrors bright,
Reflect Thine image, pure and right.

O Christ, our Life, our Hope, our King,
To Thee our grateful hearts we bring;
O let Thy love within us dwell,
And all our souls with rapture swell.

O Christ, when earthly life is done,
And we have fought and victory won,
May we behold Thee face to face,
Crowned with Thy glory and Thy grace.
